thread.title: J. Brooks
thread.title_full: Elevate Styles reviewed by J. Brooks

author: J. Brooks
title: J. Brooks
text: The website is very easy to navigate. My order was placed on Sunday, and I received it on Thursday. It arrived a day ahead of time. Was very pleased that you are given a tracking number. Was so pleased, that I recommended this site to my mom, sister, and coworkers. I'm one happy customer and I will be shopping with them again in the near future.
